version_description:
- Added 21 new furniture items
- Added 7 new lobby styles
- Fixed a bug with tickets and the ticket panel
- Fixed a freezing bug when swiping in iOS 9

- Added 21 new furniture items
- Added 7 new lobby styles
- Fixed a bug with tickets and the ticket panel
- Fixed a freezing bug when swiping in iOS 9
Fixes an issue with saving progress when storage space is low
Fixes an issue with saving progress when storage space is low

- Added support for iPhone X and newer phones!
- Fixed problems with dragging items on iPhone X
- Fixed problems with dragging when played on iPad
- Additional bug fixes and improvements
